value:
$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|$w0|A simple flip of the coin, and then...
Choose—heads or tails? What's your
call?$k$p$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Neither. I'm not a betting man.$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Now, now, don't be so stiff. As odd as
our current road may be, the two of
us are partners for now.$k$pAnd I need to know what sort of luck
my partner has.$k$p$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Partners, huh?$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Precisely. You fight with an axe, is
that right? A former partner of mine
did the same.$k$p$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Former? What happened?$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|$w0|He went and got himself killed...$k$p$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Not so lucky, then?$k$pWell, I hate to break it to you, but I
only fight to survive. And I only
survive to help my wife.$k$pSo I can't promise I'll be much help.$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|$w0|As long as you can indeed fight, that's
good enough for me. I'm counting on
you...partner.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ドルカス,ch03_17_Dorcas_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Call me a coward if you want, but I'm
retreating. I'm not dying here. I need
to survive.$k$p$WmMPID_ヨシュア,ch08_07_Jhosua_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Nobody will hire a dead mercenary,
and I quite like money... Let's wait out
this run of bad luck elsewhere.$k$p$Sbs150|
